title: Grilled lamb chop with green apple harissa, green tahini and spring onion
description: Succulent lamb chops marinated in a harissa and served with a vibrant green tahini. A simple yet sophisticated dinner for two.
ingredients: 100ml/3½fl oz garlic oil, or olive oil
½ small bunch fresh coriander, roughly chopped
2 Granny Smith apples, cored, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
small handful each fresh parsley, basil and rocket leaves
